website.name: Atlas Freight Solutions
website.description: Premier long-haul trucking and logistics company providing reliable freight transportation across North America with 24/7 dispatch and real-time tracking

theme.name: Professional Logistics
theme.aesthetic: Bold, trustworthy, and industrial with clean modern lines
theme.targetAudience: Businesses needing freight shipping, supply chain managers, logistics coordinators
theme.designPrinciples: Clean typography, strong contrast, trust-building elements, mobile-first responsive design
theme.gradientStyle: Subtle gradients from primary to darker variants for depth

pages.name: Home
pages.layout: Hero section with truck imagery, service highlights, trust indicators, and call-to-action

sections.name: Hero Section
sections.content: Compelling headline about reliable freight transportation with hero image of modern semi-truck on highway

sections.name: Services Overview
sections.content: Grid showcasing Long-Haul Trucking, Expedited Shipping, LTL/FTL options, and Specialized Transport

sections.name: Why Choose Us
sections.content: Trust indicators: 99.9% on-time delivery, 25+ years experience, real-time tracking, 24/7 dispatch

sections.name: Coverage Map
sections.content: Visual map showing service coverage across US and Canada with major routes highlighted

pages.name: Services
pages.layout: Detailed service breakdown with pricing information and capabilities

sections.name: Long-Haul Trucking
sections.content: Coast-to-coast freight transportation with dedicated drivers and modern fleet

sections.name: Expedited Shipping
sections.content: Rush deliveries with guaranteed time-sensitive transport and priority handling

sections.name: LTL & FTL Options
sections.content: Flexible shipping solutions for both partial and full truckload requirements

pages.name: About
pages.layout: Company story, team leadership, fleet information, and safety certifications

sections.name: Company Story
sections.content: 25+ years of reliable freight transportation, family-owned business values, industry expertise

sections.name: Fleet & Equipment
sections.content: Modern Peterbilt and Kenworth tractors, specialized trailers, GPS tracking, maintenance records

sections.name: Safety & Certifications
sections.content: DOT compliance, safety ratings, driver training programs, insurance coverage details

pages.name: Contact
pages.layout: Quote request form, dispatch contact info, office locations, and tracking portal

sections.name: Get Quote
sections.content: Freight quote form with pickup/delivery locations, cargo details, timeline requirements

sections.name: 24/7 Dispatch
sections.content: Emergency dispatch hotline, load coordination, driver communication, tracking support

sections.name: Office Locations
sections.content: Headquarters in Denver, regional offices in Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas with full contact details

pages.name: Tracking
pages.layout: Real-time load tracking portal with shipment status and delivery updates

sections.name: Track Shipment
sections.content: Enter tracking number or PRO number to get real-time location and delivery status

layouts.layoutStyle: Clean, professional layout with prominent CTAs, trust indicators, and mobile-responsive design
layouts.navigationStyle: Horizontal navigation with clear service categories, prominent phone number, and quote button
layouts.extra: Sticky header with contact info, footer with certifications and accreditations, testimonials integration

templateInfo.description: Complete website specification for Atlas Freight Solutions - a professional trucking and logistics company website with all placeholders filled and ready for development
